name: Solitaire Sprint - Poker Games
description:
Are you ready to play a unique card game that combines the best elements of Solitaire & Poker?

Compete against players from around the world for real money & cash prizes!

Solitaire with a Twist!
- Complete poker hands to score points on a solitaire card board
- Think fast! You only have 3 minutes to beat your opponent
- Catch on Fire! Take advantage of game power-ups to score big
- Play for fun, or compete for real cash money!

Challenge people from around the world to win real money! Climb the leaderboard, win cash, and earn many prizes!

Test your card game skills today!
